Identify_Competitors.Get_Competitor_Names: Retrieve a list of competitor businesses or brands in [industry/niche] (e.g., use Google search, business directories, etc.).
Identify_Competitors.Get_Competitor_Website_URLs: For each competitor, find the official website URL from the search results or business listings.
Identify_Competitors.Identify_Competitor_Pages: For each competitor, list the main pages of their website, including the homepage, about us page, product/service pages, blog, testimonials, contact us page, etc.
